scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n web,api "pnpm -C apps/web dev" "pnpm -C apps/api dev:local"
scripts.preview: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/api dev:local
scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/shared build && pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/api build
scripts.check: pnpm -C packages/shared check && pnpm -C apps/web check && pnpm -C apps/api check
